# From Codes to Books: A Personal Journey
> Software engineer / Book lover. I want to explor the worlds of software and stories.

A personal blog by Kyohei Takao, a software engineer in Japan.
Main topics are about software development, books, and life.

## Site Details
- URL: https://high-tail.github.io
- Generator: Jekyll (Chirpy Theme)
- Author: Kyohei Takao

## Socials
- GitHub: https://github.com/high-tail
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/username

## Blog Posts

### Local MariaDB Galera Cluster Series
A hands-on series setting up a local Galera cluster with HAProxy, ProxySQL, and Monitoring.

- **Local HAProxy, ProxySQL Cluster, Monitoring and MariaDB Galera Cluster**
  - Date: 2025-04-27
  - URL: https://high-tail.github.io/posts/mariadb-galera-cluster-final/
  - Description: Hands-on setting up local MariaDB Galera Cluster and monitoring with docker-compose.

- **MariaDB Galera Cluster with ProxySQL and HAProxy**
  - Date: 2025-03-15
  - URL: https://high-tail.github.io/posts/mariadb-galera-cluster-proxysql-haproxy/

- **MariaDB Galera Cluster with ProxySQL**
  - Date: 2025-03-01
  - URL: https://high-tail.github.io/posts/mariadb-galera-cluster-proxysql/

- **MariaDB Galera Cluster**
  - Date: 2025-02-19
  - URL: https://high-tail.github.io/posts/mariadb-galera-cluster/

## Technical Context
This site is built with Jekyll and the Chirpy theme.
The source code is hosted on GitHub.
Posts are written in Markdown with YAML Front Matter.
